mapper.insert: insert into m_menu_group(g_id, name, icon, label, seq, description, group_type, store_type) values (#{gId}, #{name}, #{icon}, #{label}, #{seq}, #{description}, #{groupType}, #{storeType})

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tt.p_id `pId`, tt.name, tt.pg_id pgId, tt.pg_name pgName, tt.description, tt.create_time createTime FROM ( SELECT pp.*, '-1' AS pg_id, '' AS pg_name FROM p_privilege_user ppu, p_privilege pp WHERE ppu.`p_id` = pp.`p_id` AND pp.p_id = #{pId} AND ppu.`privilege_flag` = '0' AND ppu.`user_id` = #{userId} AND ppu.`status_cd` = '0' AND pp.`status_cd` = '0' UNION SELECT pp.*, ppg.pg_id, ppg.name pg_name FROM p_privilege_user ppu, p_privilege_group ppg, p_privilege pp, p_privilege_rel ppr WHERE ppu.`p_id` = ppr.pg_id AND ppr.pg_id = ppg.pg_id AND ppr.p_id = pp.`p_id` AND pp.p_id = #{pId} AND ppu.`privilege_flag` = '1' AND ppu.`user_id` = #{userId} AND ppu.`status_cd` = '0' AND pp.`status_cd` = '0' AND ppg.status_cd = '0' AND ppr.status_cd = '0' ) tt
